brainly_data.question:

Can you tell me the advantages and disadvantages of genetic engineering?
brainly_data.subject: Biology

all_answers.question:
HELP NOW! IF I GET GOOD GRADES FROM YOUR INFORMATION I GIVE BRAINLIEST!!

Can you tell me the advantages and disadvantages of genetic engineering?
all_answers.subject: Biology
all_answers.text:
Some advantages of genetic engineering is: the ability to pick and chose which traits you would like your produce to have (EX: ability to last in hot or cold temps, ability to survive with less  attention, size big or small depending on what it is.....) it also allows for more product to be grown which makes more profit for farmer. 
some disadvantages: the side effects go GMOs are unknown so many people do not want to consume produce that has been genetically engineered.

all_answers.question:
HELP NOW! IF I GET GOOD GRADES FROM YOUR INFORMATION I GIVE BRAINLIEST!!

Can you tell me the advantages and disadvantages of genetic engineering?
all_answers.subject: Biology
all_answers.text: Genetic engineering has some potential advantages, such as being able to produce organisms with desired features quickly. On the other hand, it has some potential risks, for example, the inserted genes may have unexpected harmful effects.
